channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: US airlines’ daily cancellations exceed 2,700 as shutdown impact extends
item.description: U.S. airlines canceled more than 2,700 flights Sunday mostly because of the government shutdown and the Federal Aviation Administration’s order to reduce air traffic.

item.title: Trump administration demands states ‘undo’ full SNAP payouts as states warn of ‘catastrophic impact’
College students, stressed about federal food aid uncertainty, look to campuses for support
